course_details: Learn the basics of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to kickstart your web development journey.
Explore data analysis, machine learning, and data visualization techniques in Python.
Learn about the basics of cybersecurity and securing computer systems.
Build Android and iOS apps using OOP.
Explore advanced data structures and algorithmic techniques for problem-solving with sorting ,search ,dynamic programming, and graph algorithms.
Discover the principles of graphic design, including typography and layout.
Dive into the world of AI with topics like neural networks and natural language processing.
Get started with C programming, with the basics of C, including syntax, data types, control structures, and functions.
Master database design and SQL query language for data management.
